Important

  • Clean Install Required: Due to a bundle identifier update, please delete the previous version of Peggy before installing this release.
  • Requires Mac OS X 14.0 (Sonoma) or newer.

New Features

  • Integrated Sparkle framework. You can now receive and install future updates seamlessly from within the app.

Fixes & Improvements

  • Resolved an issue where the output folder path failed to visually update after selection in the Advanced Conversion dialogue.
  • Fixed a bug where multiple image selections were incorrectly treated as individual disjoint events.
  • Modified file handling in the Advanced Dialogue. Existing JPEGs in the source folder/selection are no longer automatically skipped.
  • Fresh look! Updated the application name and app icon.
